info.+content: トロピカル～ジュ！プリキュア

Manatsu Natsuumi moves from an island to Aozora City, to live with her mom. There, she meets Laura, a mermaid, who makes her a Pretty Cure using the power of makeup. Manatsu and her fellow Pretty Cures fight against the servants of the Witch of Delays, who stole the motivation power from Laura's Mermaid Kingdom and are now trying to steal it from the human world.
#1: "Viva! Spark! Tropical-Rouge! Precure" (Viva! Spark!トロピカル～ジュ！プリキュア) by Machico (eps 1-18)
#2: "Viva! Spark! Tropical-Rouge! Precure with Tropical Club" (Viva! Spark!トロピカル～ジュ！プリキュア withトロピカる部) by Machico and Tropical Club (eps 19-32, 34-46)
#3: "Viva! Spark! Tropical-Rouge! Precure -Tropical Club version-" (Viva! Spark!トロピカル〜ジュ！プリキュア 〜トロピカる部Ver.〜) by Tropical Club (ep 33)
#1: "Tropica ING" (トロピカ I・N・G) by Chihaya Yoshitake (eps 1-16)
#2: "Aiming To Go My Way!!" (あこがれ Go My Way!!) by Rie Kitagawa and Chihaya Yoshitake (eps 17-32, 37-46)
#3: "Shantia ~Kingdom of Happiness~ Ending Ver." (シャンティア〜しあわせのくに〜 エンディング主題歌Ver.) by Tropical-Rouge Cures and Heartcatch Cures (eps 33-36)
トロピカル～ジュ！プリキュア | 東映アニメーション
